description.name: trumpsol
description.tagline: TRUMP Solana Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto sol-trump Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept TRUMP Solana directly on your website
Unique sol/trump receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your sol/trump wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
